overview: Beautiful lesbians explore the joys of anal sex in the second installment of Sweetheart's newest, critically acclaimed series. Mindi Mink is nervous to try anal for the first time, but experienced beauty Casey Calvert gives her a life-altering anal lesson in a very passionate and authentic scene. College resident assistant Lauren Phillips helps Maya Kendrick take it slow with a hot and heavy lesbian experience that ends with anal toy play. College girls Christiana Cinn and Ember Snow have fun experimenting with each others insatiable bodies learning the art of anal play, and teacher India Summer counsels substitute teacher Olive Glass in maintaining control in the classroom and in the bedroom.
title: Lesbian Anal 2
